      • getFirstMatch

        public static java.lang.String getFirstMatch(java.util.List<java.lang.String> lines,
                                             java.util.regex.Pattern regex)
        Finds the first match in a list os Strings.
        Parameters:
        lines - list of lines, may be null.
        regex - pattern to match to.
        Returns:
        pattern's first matched group, or entire matched string if pattern has no groups, or null.
